授業目的: The purpose of this course is to familiarize students with the TOEIC test.
到達目標:
Students will be able to practice listening skills relevant to the TOEIC test.
Students will be able to practice reading skills relevant to the TOEIC test.

第1回: Students will be given a Reading pack, similar to TOEIC Part 7. They will also be given a vocabulary practice pack. This pack must be handed in by the final class.
